``` {r}
#set working directory
setwd("C:/Users/Syona Neeraj/Desktop")
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(reshape2)
Data <- read.csv(here("Data", "Fried food.csv")) #loaded the data
View(Data)
head(Data)
Data <- Data[-c(1),]
Data <- Data%>% select(-P)
View(Data)
head(Data)
Data <- Data[-c(1),]
head(Data)

names(Data)
Data2 <- Data%>%
  rename(serving_0 = None..n.15.166.,serving_1 = X.1.serving.week..n.38.482.,serving_2 = X1.2.servings.week..n.33.210.,serving_3 = X3.6.servings.week..n.15.480.,serving_max = Ã¢..1.serving.day..n.4628.) #renaming columns
head(Data2)
df_racialgroup <- Data2 %>% slice_head(n = 5)
head(df_racialgroup)
df_diseases <- Data2 %>% slice(39:41)
head(df_diseases)

as.matrix.data.frame(df_racialgroup)
df_racialgroup[,-1]
mytable1 = as.matrix(df_racialgroup[,-1])
row.names(mytable1) <- df_racialgroup$serving
barplot(
  mytable1,
  xlab = "servings per week",
  ylab = "Fried food consumption",
  col=brewer.pal(nrow(mytable1), "Paired"),
  legend.text=TRUE,
  args.legend = list(x = "topright",bty='n',xpd = TRUE,cex=0.48,inset = c(- 0.48, 0)))

as.matrix.data.frame(df_diseases)
df_diseases[,-1]
mytable2 = as.matrix(df_diseases[,-1])
row.names(mytable2) <- df_diseases$serving
barplot(mytable2,
  xlab = "servings per week",
  ylab = "Fried food consumption",
  col=brewer.pal(nrow(mytable2), "Paired"),
  legend.text=TRUE,
  args.legend = list(x = "topright",bty='n',xpd = TRUE,cex=0.48,inset = c(- 0.48, 0)))
```
